Sentencas: The current study investigates the influence of adding excess Na on the structure and conductivity of Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3.
Titulo: Influence of excess sodium addition on the structural characteristics and electrical conductivity of Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3

Sentencas: Polycrystalline bulk samples were prepared via conventional solid-state reaction method.
Titulo: Influence of excess sodium addition on the structural characteristics and electrical conductivity of Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3

Sentencas: XRD confirmed the presence of rhombohedral perovskite as a primary phase in all the samples.
Titulo: Influence of excess sodium addition on the structural characteristics and electrical conductivity of Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3

Sentencas: SEM revealed the existence of secondary phases which were found to increase considerably with the higher addition of excess Na.
Titulo: Influence of excess sodium addition on the structural characteristics and electrical conductivity of Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3

Sentencas: Chemical analysis via EDXS indicates Na deficiency in the sintered sample of stoichiometric Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3, while the average Na/Bi molar ratio found to be more than unity in all the Na-excess compositions.
Titulo: Influence of excess sodium addition on the structural characteristics and electrical conductivity of Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3

Sentencas: Impedance spectroscopy studies showed at least 3 orders of magnitude conductivity difference between the Na-excess and pure Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3 samples.
Titulo: Influence of excess sodium addition on the structural characteristics and electrical conductivity of Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3

Sentencas: The bulk conductivity was found to increase with the addition of excess Na, which was attributed to the increase in oxygen vacancy.
Titulo: Influence of excess sodium addition on the structural characteristics and electrical conductivity of Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3

Sentencas: Although partial substitution of Na for A-site Bi appears to be a promising strategy for the conductivity enhancement, these compositions show significant segregation of secondary phases on excess Na addition.
Titulo: Influence of excess sodium addition on the structural characteristics and electrical conductivity of Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3
